Serif is a members club for LGBTQ+ and ally leaders from all industries: Fashion, Entertainment, Finance, Music, Tech, and beyond.

As a member, youâ€™ll have access to a curated community and a place to network, entertain, be entertained, find inspiration, and maybe even fall in love.

Ahead of opening, we invite you to become a member of our inaugural location on 66 east 55th Street.

Welcome

To the World of serif

1st floor

Arrival. Community. Programming.

From speaker series about culture, business, and leadership to live music and storytelling, Serif fosters community through groundbreaking programming.

Join us for bespoke networking events where organic connections with other members spark new beginnings.

Dining & Social Experiences

With multiple indoor and outdoor dining spaces, lounges, and bars, Serif can be your place to entertain or be entertained.

From power luncheons with curated leaders to dinner and a show by named talent, Serif is consistently programmed for you to meet other members.

Curated by Noho Hospitality, Serif is your next haunt. Stop by with friends, reserve a table or work with our concierge to plan your next big event.

Steam. Sauna. Locker Rooms.

Your membership includes access to our full-floor steam, sauna, shower, locker, and beauty rooms.

Fitness. Wellness. Work.

Available work spaces, bookable conference rooms, and quiet phone booths make Serif the perfect place for you to work away from the office.

A boutique gym and class studio constantly activated by your favorite brands give you another way to connect with Serif members and accomplish your personal goals.

Founding Members only

Tucked away on the secluded sixth floor, only Founding Members have private elevator access to the Penthouse â€” a place for Founders and their guests to entertain and be entertained.

The Penthouse is also home to Founder-Only programming and events.
